text: Andrejs Rubins (26 November 1978 â€“ 1 August 2022) was a Latvian professional footballer. He played as a left midfielder. He played for the Latvia national team from 1998 until 2011, making 117 appearances. Rubins died on 1 August 2022 at the age of 43. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Latvian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Riga
title: Andrejs Rubins
